title: Alibaba’s challenges Meituan with new AI tool for 3D restaurant tours
content:
maybefalse/iStock Unreleased via Getty Images

Tech giant Alibaba Group Holding ( BABA ) is launching a new artificial intelligence tool designed to help restaurants create 3D virtual tours of their interiors and dining atmospheres, according to a report by Bloomberg.

According to the report , Alibaba’s mapping giant, AutoNavi (Amap) will
